heading: Creating a Database
exampleDescription:
To create a database in your project, right click on your Project in the Solution Explorer, and Add a new item:


Then select a Service Based Database:


You should now see your database in the "Server Explorer" view:


If you double click on your database, then you can right click on the Tables folder to create a table:


From here you can give your table the specified columns:

and also change the name of the Table in the SQL query:


Then run the update to create your table:


Now we can create a DataSet from our database. Open the Data Sources view and click "Add New Data Source" (If you cannot click this, click on your project in the Solution Explorer and then try to add it)


Go through the Wizard to create the Data Set, choosing your database file as the connection:


and check to include the Table you have created in your dataset:


And now you should be able to see a Connection String in your App.config file:
